languages.text:
A Soldier is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.
languages.original_text:
Солдат мастерски владеет всеми видами дистанционного оружия и способен быстро занять выгодную позицию, чтобы обрушить на врага град выстрелов. Солдат прошел разноплановую боевую подготовку и может особенно эффективно поражать цели, стреляя {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередями{/g} и совершая атаки по области.
Ключевые особенности: дистанционные атаки и атаки в движении, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g}, стрельба очередями, атаки по площади.

traits.locale_text:
A Marksman is a master of all ranged weapons who quickly assumes an advantageous position, ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Marksman is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with burst fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, cover and dodge, burst fire, area attacks.

A Marksman is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Marksman is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with burst fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, cover and dodge, burst fire, area attacks.

Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Стрелок мастерски владеет всеми видами дистанционного оружия и способен быстро занять выгодную позицию, чтобы обрушить на врага град выстрелов. Стрелок прошел разноплановую боевую подготовку и может особенно эффективно поражать цели, стреляя очередями и совершая атаки по области.
Ключевые особенности: дистанционные атаки и атаки в движении, укрытия и уклонения, стрельба очередями, атаки по области.

Стрелок мастерски владеет всеми видами дистанционного оружия и способен быстро занять выгодную позицию, чтобы обрушить на врага град выстрелов. Стрелок прошел разноплановую боевую подготовку и может особенно эффективно поражать цели, стреляя очередями и совершая атаки по области.
Ключевые особенности: дистанционные атаки и атаки в движении, укрытия и уклонения, стрельба очередями, атаки по области.

languages.text:
士兵是远程武器方面的专家，可以迅速占据有利位置，向敌人倾泻枪林弹雨。士兵精通各种各样的武器，尤其擅长使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击与范围攻击消灭敌人。
核心：移动、远程攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、连发射击、范围攻击。
languages.original_text:
A Soldier is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.

traits.locale_text:
神射手是{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器方面的专家，可以迅速占据有利位置，向敌人倾泻枪林弹雨。神射手精通各种各样的武器，尤其擅长使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}射击与范围攻击消灭敌人。
核心：移动、远程攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}、连发射击、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。

士兵是{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器方面的专家，可以迅速占据有利位置，向敌人倾泻枪林弹雨。士兵精通各种各样的武器，尤其擅长使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击与范围攻击消灭敌人。
核心：移动、远程攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、连发射击、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
Un soldado domina todas las armas a distancia y es capaz de ocupar rápidamente una posición ventajosa desde la que desatar una lluvia de balas sobre el enemigo. Aunque está bien entrenado en una amplia variedad de armas, un soldado es particularmente eficaz abatiendo a sus objetivos con {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfagas{/g} de proyectiles y armas con área de efecto.
Especialidades: movimiento y ataques a distancia, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, ataques de ráfaga, ataques de área.
languages.original_text:
A Soldier is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Un tirador de élite domina todas las armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} y es capaz de ocupar rápidamente una posición ventajosa desde la que desatar una lluvia de balas sobre el enemigo. Aunque está bien entrenado en una amplia variedad de armas, un tirador de élite es particularmente eficaz abatiendo a sus objetivos con {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfagas{/g} de proyectiles y armas con área de efecto.
Especialidades: movimiento y ataques a distancia, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, ataques de ráfaga, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}.

languages.text:
Ein Soldat versteht sich meisterhaft auf die Nutzung aller Waffen für den Fernkampf. Schnell kann er vorteilhafte Positionen einnehmen, um von dort aus den Feind unter Beschuss zu nehmen. Ein Soldat ist zwar für den Einsatz unterschiedlichster Waffen ausgebildet, besonders gut aber versteht er sich darauf, seine Ziele mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenfeuer{/g} und mit Flächenangriffen zu attackieren.
Hauptfokus: Bewegung und Fernkampfangriffe, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, Salvenfeuer, Flächenangriffe.
languages.original_text:
A Soldier is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.

traits.locale_text: Ein Scharfschütze versteht sich meisterhaft auf die Nutzung aller Waffen für den {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}. Schnell kann er vorteilhafte Positionen einnehmen, um von dort aus den Feind unter Beschuss zu nehmen. Ein Schatzschütze ist zwar für den Einsatz unterschiedlichster Waffen ausgebildet, besonders gut aber versteht er sich darauf, seine Ziele mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bündelfeuer{/g} und mit Flächenangriffen zu attackieren. Hauptfokus: Bewegung und Fernkampfangriffe, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, Bündelfeuer, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}.

languages.text:
Les soldats sont des experts des armes à distance, capables de trouver rapidement une position avantageuse, d'où ils se tiennent prêts à faire feu sur l'ennemi. Formés à un vaste éventail d'armes, les soldats maîtrisent tout particulièrement les tirs en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} et les armes de zone.
Points forts : déplacements et attaques à distance, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, tirs en rafale, attaques de zone.
languages.original_text:
A Soldier is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Un Tireur d'Élite est un expert des armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, capable de trouver rapidement une position avantageuse, d'où il se tient prêt à faire feu sur l'ennemi. Formé à un large éventail d'armes, le Tireur d'Élite maîtrise tout particulièrement les tirs en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafale{/g} et les armes de zone.
Points forts : déplacements et attaques à distance, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}, tirs en rafale, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}.

languages.text:
兵士は、あらゆるレンジウェポンを使いこなし、有利な位置に素早く移動し、そこから敵に砲火を浴びせることができる。多種多様な武器を使いこなせるが、同時に{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}射撃と範囲攻撃でターゲットを吹き飛ばすことに長けている。
主な特徴：移動と範囲攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、バースト射撃、範囲攻撃。
languages.original_text:
A Soldier is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.

traits.locale_text:
マークスマンは、あらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器の名手であり、優位を取れる位置を即座に特定し、そこから射撃の雨を敵に浴びせかける。多種多様な武器に精通するマークスマンは、特に{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バースト{/g}射撃や範囲攻撃武器で標的を吹き飛ばすことに長けている。
コアフォーカス：移動と遠隔攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、バースト射撃、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}。

兵士は、あらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:Range}レンジ{/g}ウェポンを使いこなし、有利な位置に素早く移動し、そこから敵に砲火を浴びせることができる。多種多様な武器を使いこなせるが、同時に{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}射撃と範囲攻撃でターゲットを吹き飛ばすことに長けている。
主な特徴：移動と範囲攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、バースト射撃、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}。

languages.text:
Asker, tüm menzilli silahlarda ustadır. Süratle avantajlı bir pozisyona geçerek düşmanın üzerine ateş yağdırır. Asker, birbirinden çok farklı silah türlerinde eğitim almış olsa da hedefini {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırılarla{/g} ve alan etkili silahlarla kalbura çevirmekte özellikle uzmandır.
Güçlü yönleri: Hareketlilik ve menzilli saldırılar, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, seri atış, alan saldırıları.
languages.original_text:
A Soldier is a master of all ranged weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, area attacks.
